com.aylanetworks.aylasdk

类 AylaCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaCache

  • public class AylaCache
extends java.lang.Object
    AylaCache class controls caching in Ayla SDK. AylaCache allows devices and properties to be saved so they are available when service connectivity is not available. Typical use case is in LAN-login feature (device access without service authentication). LAN configuration information is stored in an encrypted form tied to the session that was active when the data was cached. As long as the last valid authentication was used to sign in offline, the cache will properly decrypt any encrypted information saved from that session.

    • 方法详细资料

      • enable

        public void enable()
        Enable caching using AylaCache

      • disable

        public void disable()
        Disable caching using AylaCache

      • isCachingEnabled

        public boolean isCachingEnabled()
        Returns true if caching using AylaCache is enabled, false if disabled

      • clearAll

        public void clearAll()
        Clear all values stored in Ayla Cache.

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String cacheKey,
                 java.lang.String value)
        Save data to AylaCache when a complete cache key is known. Cache key can be obtained from the method getKey(CacheType, String). Alternatively, use save(CacheType, String, String)
        参数:
        cacheKey - Key to identify cache to which data is to be saved.
        value - Data to be stored. If this value is null, the key will be removed.

      • save

        public void save(AylaCache.CacheType type,
                 java.lang.String id,
                 java.lang.String value)
        Add data to AylaCache with cache type and unique id.
        参数:
        type - Cache type
        id - to be appended to the cache type prefix for this entry. Required for property, lan_config and node types.
        value - Data to be stored. If this is null, the key will be removed.

      • getData

        public java.lang.String getData(java.lang.String key)
        Get saved data from AylaCache.
        参数:
        key - key for AylaCache entry.

      • getKey

        public java.lang.String getKey(AylaCache.CacheType type,
                               java.lang.String id)
        Get cache key for retrieving data for this cache type.
        参数:
        type - Cache type
        id - Unique id to be appended to the cache type prefix for this entry.
        返回:
        key which can be used to access data from this cache.

      • saveArray

        public <T> void saveArray(AylaCache.CacheType cacheType,
                          java.lang.String id,
                          T[] array)
        Convert an array to JSON format and save it in cache.
        参数:
        cacheType - Cache type
        id - Unique id to be appended to the cache type prefix for this entry.
        array - Array to be converted to JSON and saved in AylaCache.
